statements: DELETE FROM recipe_recommendations WHERE user_id = 1 AND recipe_id = 101;
DELETE FROM recipe_recommendations WHERE user_id = 101 AND recipe_id = 201;
DELETE FROM recipe_recommendations WHERE rating < 4.0 AND ingredient_id IN (SELECT ingredient_id FROM ingredients WHERE category = 'Spices');
DELETE FROM recipes WHERE recipe_id = 100 AND recipe_name = 'Cheeseburger';
DELETE FROM recipes WHERE serving_size > 6 AND difficulty_level = 3;
DELETE FROM shopping_list WHERE user_id = 100 AND quantity < 5;
DELETE FROM user_preferences WHERE user_id = 500 AND ingredient_id <> 10;
